content: the wingello washcloth is a simple circle to square granny square it can be made using cotton to create a single washcloth or you can make multiple squares using any fibre and join them together to make a blanket i have listed 8ply as the yarn weight and a 4mm hook however you can use any weight and the appropriate hook size for your yarn and gauge the finished size of the square is approximately 20cm x 20cm it is written in english using us and uk crochet terms skill level beginner familiarity with basic crochet stitches and working in the round is desirable please share photos of your finished items as i love seeing the work of others happy hooking regards elizabeth copyright notice you are welcome to sell products you make from this pattern provided you do not claim the pattern as your own please give credit to me by stating pattern by elizabeth castle and/or a link to my website www castlehandmade com au you do not have permission to recopy rewrite redistribute or resell my patterns in any form
